metadata.title: CVE-2020-15366 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in ajv.validate() in Ajv (aka Another JSON SchemaValidator) 6.12.2. A carefully crafted JSON schema could be provided thatallows execution of other code by prototype pollution. (While untrustedschemas are recommended against, the worst case of an untrusted schemashould be a denial of service, not execution of code.)

criterions.comment: node-ajv: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
